TITLE.P: 860_18 Refuse and Recycling products

SHORT_DESCR.P: In this instance ESPO are establishing a national framework for the provision of Refuse and Recycling Products,including but not limited to plastic wheeled bins (2 and 4 wheels), steel wheeled bins (4 wheels), steel wheeledbin maintenance, plastic refuse sacks, compostable liners, food caddy's, kerbside boxes, bin lockdown frames,bin housing units, compost bins and composting accessories.

TITLE.P: Supply of Plastic Wheeled Bins (2 Wheeled)

SHORT_DESCR.P: Tenderers are invited for the supply and direct delivery of plastic wheeled bins (2 wheeled) to eligible end user establishments.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The framework agreement has the option to extend for up to a further 24 months. The total estimated value stated in Section II.1.7 includes the option period.

TITLE.P: Supply of Plastic Wheeled Bins (4 Wheeled)

SHORT_DESCR.P: Tenderers are invited for the supply and direct delivery of plastic wheeled bins (4 wheeled) to eligible end user establishments.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The framework agreement has the option to extend for up to a further 24 months. The total estimated value stated in Section II.1.7 includes the option period.

TITLE.P: Supply of Steel Wheeled Bins (4 Wheeled)

SHORT_DESCR.P: Tenderers are invited for the supply and direct delivery of steel wheeled bins (4 wheeled) to eligible end user establishments.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The framework agreement has the option to extend for up to a further 24 months. The total estimated value stated in Section II.1.7 includes the option period.

TITLE.P: Bin Maintenance and Repair (Mobile and Factory Based)

SHORT_DESCR.P: Tenderers are invited for the provision of bin maintenance and repair services to eligible end userestablishments.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The framework agreement has the option to extend for up to a further 24 months. The total estimated value stated in Section II.1.7 includes the option period.

TITLE.P: Supply of Spare Parts

SHORT_DESCR.P: Tenderers are invited for the supply and direct delivery of spare parts for steel wheeled bins (4 wheeled) to eligible end user establishments.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The framework agreement has the option to extend for up to a further 24 months. The total estimated value stated in Section II.1.7 includes the option period.

TITLE.P: Supply of Lockdown Frames for Bins

SHORT_DESCR.P: Tenderers are invited for the supply and direct delivery of lockdown frames for bins to eligible end user establishments.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The framework agreement has the option to extend for up to a further 24 months. The total estimated value stated in Section II.1.7 includes the option period.

TITLE.P: Supply of Kerbside Recycling Boxes (Including Inner Caddies)

SHORT_DESCR.P: Tenderers are invited for the supply and direct delivery of lockdown frames for bins to eligible end user establishments.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The framework agreement has the option to extend for up to a further 24 months. The total estimated value stated in Section II.1.7 includes the option period.

TITLE.P: Supply of Stackable Boxes for Waste

SHORT_DESCR.P: Tenderers are invited for the supply and direct delivery of stackable boxes for waste to eligible end user establishments.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The framework agreement has the option to extend for up to a further 24 months. The total estimated value stated in Section II.1.7 includes the option period.

TITLE.P: Supply of Kerbside Recycling Bags

SHORT_DESCR.P: Tenderers are invited for the supply and direct delivery of kerbside recycling bags to eligible end user establishments.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The framework agreement has the option to extend for up to a further 24 months. The total estimated value stated in Section II.1.7 includes the option period.

TITLE.P: Supply of Food Waste Containers (Caddies)

SHORT_DESCR.P: Tenderers are invited for the supply and direct delivery of food waste containers (caddies) to eligible end user establishments.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The framework agreement has the option to extend for up to a further 24 months. The total estimated value stated in Section II.1.7 includes the option period.

TITLE.P: Supply of Compostable Liners

SHORT_DESCR.P: Tenderers are invited for the supply and direct delivery of compostable liners to eligible end user establishments.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The framework agreement has the option to extend for up to a further 24 months. The total estimated value stated in Section II.1.7 includes the option period.

TITLE.P: Supply of Plastic Refuse Sacks (Bin Bags)

SHORT_DESCR.P: Tenderers are invited for the supply and direct delivery of plastic refuse sacks to eligible end user establishments.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The framework agreement has the option to extend for up to a further 24 months. The total estimated value stated in Section II.1.7 includes the option period.

TITLE.P: Supply of Waste Housing Units

SHORT_DESCR.P: Tenderers are invited for the supply and direct delivery of waste housing units to eligible end user establishments.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The framework agreement has the option to extend for up to a further 24 months. The total estimated value stated in Section II.1.7 includes the option period.

TITLE.P: Total Managed Solutions for Compost Bins

SHORT_DESCR.P: Tenderers are invited for a total managed service for the supply and delivery of compost bins to eligible end user establishments.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The framework agreement has the option to extend for up to a further 24 months. The total estimated value stated in Section II.1.7 includes the option period.

TITLE.P: Total Managed Solutions for Compost Bins

SHORT_DESCR.P: Tenderers are invited for the supply and direct delivery of compost bins and ancillary supplies for compost bins to eligible end user establishments.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The framework agreement has the option to extend for up to a further 24 months. The total estimated value stated in Section II.1.7 includes the option period.

INFO_ADD.P: As a Central Purchasing Body as defined by the EU Procurement Directive 2014/24/EU, the Framework Agreement is open for use by Public Bodies (defined https://www.espo.org/ESPO/media/Documents/FAQs/ESPO-s_powers_to_trade__website_-2016-12-22.pdf) that also fall into one of the following classifications of user throughout all administrative regions of the UK: Local Authorities; Educational Establishments (including Academies); Central Government Departments and Agencies; Police, Fire and Rescue and Coastguard Emergency Services; NHS and HSC Bodies, including Ambulance Services; Registered Charities; Registered Social Landlords; or any public body established by or under the Scotland Act 1998 or any Act of the Scottish Parliament. Details of the classification of end user establishments and geographical areas is available on: http://www.espo.org/About-us-%281 %29/FAQs/Legal

REVIEW_PROCEDURE.P: Information on deadlines(s) for review procedures can be found in Part 3, Chapter 6 of the Public Contracts Regulations 2015.
